TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Qara, title = Qara, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qara} }

S.FORM: alang Qara ga niya mki sku Toweng si atu Hosing Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 119 buwan, 294 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 54 kyan ku 158 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 46 kyan ku 136 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, maki qu ngasal bziran, ru kyokay. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Qara hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Qara hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Qara hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Qara hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Qara hya' ga Balung. tay 'zil na Qara hya' ga Tkasan. rekisi kayal kyokay maki sazing kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy cyux qutux pqwasan biru qalang Qara. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
